plot: A love story between an heiress who tries to save her father's legacy, the one and only seven-star hotel in the nation and the hotel manager who becomes an enemy to his own father who abandoned him in order to help the heiress.
plot_en: A love story between an heiress who tries to save her father's legacy, the one and only seven-star hotel in the nation and the hotel manager who becomes an enemy to his own father who abandoned him in order to help the heiress.
plot_es: A love story between an heiress who tries to save her father's legacy, the one and only seven-star hotel in the nation and the hotel manager who becomes an enemy to his own father who abandoned him in order to help the heiress.
title: Hotel King
